verses.text: Ix yalanxi winhaj Job chi' icha tik:
Ha ticnaik anheja' yel wav yuj in yaelal tik. Wach'chom tzin te k'acwi, palta anheja' yak'anoch in yaelal Dios.
Comonoc swojtaquejeli b'ajtil tz'ilchaj Dios chi' wuuj, tas pax tz'aj in k'och b'aj ay sdespacho.
Tato icha chi' tzam wal t'ay yuj in yaelal tik, yujto tzijtum tas tzin nib'ej swal t'ay yuj in colan in b'a.
Tzin nib'ej swojtaquejeli tas ol yal t'ayin.
¿Tocwal ol yak'lab'ej yip yic tzin skachanem numnajoc? Maay, ol smaclej yab' tas ol wala'.
Ol am yojtaquejeli to yel swala', ol am yalani to malaj in mul. Icham chi' ol aj in yak'anel t'a libre t'a junelnhej.
Tzin sayek' Dios t'a stojolal b'aj sjawi k'u, malaj ayek' ta'. Tzin saypaxek' t'a stojolal b'aj tz'em k'u, max ilchajpaxlaj wuj ta'.
Tzin sayek' t'a stojolal norte, max ilchajlaj wuuj. Anhejtona', tzin sayanxi t'a stojolal sur, max sch'ox pax sb'a t'ayin ta'.
Palta yojtak in b'eyb'al. Ayic ol lajwoc in yak'an prowal, wach'xonhej ol in ajkan icha k'een oro sb'o t'a kal k'ak'.
Ha jun b'eyb'al ix sch'oxkan t'ayin, malaj b'ak'uinh swactejkan in b'eyb'alani.
Tzin k'anab'ajejnhej schecnab'il yet' sk'ayb'ub'al. Ek'b'alxo yelk'och schecnab'il chi' t'a yichanh b'eyumal t'a yol in sat.
Ayic snaan Dios sk'ulan junok tasi, sk'ulejnhej, malaj junok mach syal skachanoch waan.
Ha tas nab'il yuj sk'ulan t'ayin, sk'ulejnhej. Tzijtumto pax tas nab'il yuj t'a wib'anh.
Yuj wal chi' tzin te xiv t'ay. Anhej tzin naancoti tzin te xivk'ei.
Ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, yuj tz'el wip yuj xiwelal.
Wach'chom maxtzac wil-laj yuj k’ik’ k’inal oyanoch t'a in patic, palta max in emlaj numan.
